name: Cotton leggings, blue and yellow chevron toddler pants - organic & exclusive
description:
These leggings are printed exclusively for "luckypalmtree" on a certified 100% US organic cotton printed with low impact, non-toxic dyes, and made with 100% cotton thread. Our products are not only better for your baby but also better for the Earth.

Organic cotton 95% spandex 5%

Ultra breathable and satiny soft leggings, perfect for sensitive and fragile baby skin. They are stretchy and roomy so there is enough room for diaper and some action! name: Snap Pocket Baby Bib, Grey Dottie - Organic
description:
This adorable bib is perfect for self-feeding babies and toddlers!

It may be a little big for babies, but I purposely sized it generously so that you can continue using it when your baby is ready for some food! My baby has been using this since she was 5 months and until now. My daughter is two years old and these bibs were and still are a big helper when it comes to mealtime.

The pocket easily comes off and makes cleaning super easy!
Fabric: 100% certified organic cotton(GOTS)


Organic and Handmade in USA with love.

name: Organic Reversible Bib, Bright Leaves
description:
This bib is perfect for drooling newborn babies and also for self-feeding toddlers.

It may be a little big for infants, but I purposely sized it generously so that you can continue using it when your baby is ready for some food! My baby has been using this since she was 5 months and until now. My daughter is two years old and these bibs were and still are a big helper when it comes to mealtime.

Item Specifications: 
Fabric: 100% certified organic cotton (GOTS) 
Printed with low impact dye, Non-toxic 
I use only 100% cotton thread for sewing and hemming.

Dimension: width-9" height-11" 
Velcro tape finish, no metal snap or plastic snap! No need to worry about baby licking harmful metal or plastic!

It is sized generously so you can continuously use it to toddler years.

Front: beige elephant 
back: organic natural cotton knit 100 % certified cotton knit, unbleached.


Organic and Handmade in USA with love. 
All items in my shop are made in smoke free and pet free home studio.

name: Baby Mittens, Persimmon Chevron -organic
description:
These adorable baby mittens are 100% organic cotton and printed with low impact dye, non-toxic. 

When I had my beautiful baby girl 2 years ago, I noticed how important mittens are. Babies rub their eyes and cheeks constantly. Sometimes my baby was left with a scar that made my heart drop. I realized the importance of good mittens. And I also noticed that some of the mittens that I found in the market had a strong chemical smell and they weren’t 100 % cotton.

Babies lick mittens all the time. I wanted to make safe mittens that all moms can be peace at their heart. Also some parents worry that if mittens fit too tight, it might affect their finger movement and brain development. These mittens fit snug around baby's wrist but have enough room for them to move their tiny fingers.

*Cute mittens are available in prints and also in solid unbleached natural cotton knit.

Fabric : 100% ORGANIC cotton (GOTS) 
Printed with low impact dyes, non toxic


Organic and Handmade in USA with love.
All items in my shop are made in smoke free and pet free home studio.

name: Organic Baby Blanket and hat set, Mod French Flower Red
description:
This blanket is hand drawn by me and printed exclusively for "luckypalmtree" on luxurious and soft organic cotton printed interlock knit with low impact dyes.
This cotton jersey knit blanket is made with cotton that is grown in USA and unbleached and natural.

This listing is for one aqua arrow organic blanket!

This is so soft and it will be even softer after washes. This is one layer of cotton knit and size is 33"x31" big enough to last to toddler years and for the crib bedding!

You will want to keep this in your bag all the time like me. I used this blanket to swaddle my baby and use it as changing pad, in the crib, and as a stroller blanket! This is a truly all year around blanket that you must have one!
It is light enough for use as a spring/summer blanket as well. 

Fabric: 100% certified(GOTS) organic interlock knit blanket. US grown cotton knit printed with water based, non toxic ink

Dimention:33x31

Washing instruction: Machine wash cold with phosphate-free detergent, gentle cycle, non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry low, warm iron if needed.

I use only 100% cotton thread for sewing and hemming. This item is finished with white serge stitch.
